SX0024/23 AIP SUPPLEMENT EDDK/COLOGNE/BONN VALIDITY:05OCT23-JUN24 - NEW CONSTRUCTION OF TWY B. AT KLN/BONN AIRPORT, THE ENTIRE TWY B IS BEING RENOVATED. FOR THIS PURPOSE, EIGHT CONSTRUCTION PHASES WERE DEFINED PRIOR TO THE MEASURE. THE AREA BETWEEN THRESHOLD 14R AND THRESHOLD 06 HAS ALREADY BEEN COMPLETED. THE SECTION OF CONSTRUCTION PHASE 2.3 WILL BE COMPLETED ON 04 OCT 2023 AND RE-OPENED TO FLIGHT OPERATIONS. IN THE PERIOD FROM 05 OCT 2023 JUN 2024, THE RENOVATION WORK OF CONSTRUCTION PHASE 3 WILL BE CARRIED OUT.TWY B WILL BE RESURFACED IN CONCRETE. IN UNFAVOURABLE METEOROLOGICAL CONDITIONS, THE LARGE-SCALE GROUND CONSTRUCTION WORK MAY CAUSE VISIBLE ACCUMULATIONS OF DUST. THE CLOSED TWY SECTIONS WILL BE MARKED/LIGHTED DURING THE DAY AND AT NIGHT. DURING THE ENTIRE CONSTRUCTION PERIOD, THE FOLLOWING RESTRICTIONS TO FLIGHT OPERATIONS AS WELL AS SPECIAL OPERATING PROCEDURES WILL APPLY: - CLOSURE OF THE INTERSECTION AREA TWY B AND TWY A DUE TO CONSTRUCTION PHASE BA 3. - CLOSURE OF AIRCRAFT STANDS B17, B14, B12, B11, B10, C50, C06, E09 AND E10, AND RESTRICTION FOR STAND B16 FOR THE PARKING OF AIRCRAFT (RETOWING OF AIRCRAFT IS ONLY POSSIBLE IF STAND B18 IS VACANT). -THERE WILL BE NO TAXIWAY CONNECTION BETWEEN TWY B - TWY A7 AND TWY A5 DURING THE ENTIRE CONSTRUCTION PERIOD. TWY A5 CAN BE ACCESSED VIA TWY A (UP TO CODE LETTER F) AND VIA TWY E (FOR CODE LETTER C, EXCLUDING A321, B737 MAX 10, MD-82). -THERE WILL BE A DIVERSION FOR TWY A BEYOND THE CONSTRUCTION AREA DURING THE CONSTRUCTION WORK. ESTABLISHMENT OF A PROVISIONAL TWY CENTRELINE TO BYPASS THE SECTION OF CONSTRUCTION PHASE 3 VIA AREAS NORTHEAST OF THE CONSTRUCTION SITE (REDUCED AREAS OF TWY A). THIS INTERIM TAXI GUIDANCE IS RESTRICTED TO CODE LETTER C AIRCRAFT. DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (DPI) MSG PROVIDED TO NETWORK MANAGER OPERATIONS CENTER (NMOC). 1.1. ADS-B DATA REQUIRED 1.1.1. FOR ADS-B DATA USED BY THE AD OPERATOR AND EUROCONTROL, PILOTS OF AIRCRAFT EQUIPPED WITH MODE S AND ADS-B FUNCTIONALITY MUST, WHEN OPERATING ON THE GROUND: A) SELECT AUTOMATIC MODE AND THE ASSIGNED MODE A, OR B) IF AUTOMATIC MODE IS NOT AVAILABLE, SELECT ON AND THE ASSIGNED MODE A - FROM THE REQUEST OF PUSH-BACK. - AFTER LANDING, UNTIL THE AIRCRAFT HAS STOPPED ON HIS STAND. - WHEN THE AIRCRAFT IS FULLY PARKED, THE PILOT SHALL SELECT STBY. 1.1.2. WHEN THE AIRCRAFT IS CAPABLE OF COMMUNICATING ITS IDENTIFICATION (I.E. THE CALLSIGN USED IN FLIGHT), THIS MUST BE ENTERED (VIA THE FMS OR TRANSPONDER CONTROL PANEL) AT THE TIME OF THE PUSH-BACK REQUEST. 1.1.3. THE CREW MUST USE THE FORMAT DEFINED BY ICAO TO ENTER THE AIRCRAFT IDENTIFICATION. 1.1.4. IN ORDER NOT TO COMPROMISE THE PERFORMANCE OF SYSTEMS BASED ON SSR FREQUENCIES (INCLUDING AIRBORNE TCAS AND SSR RADARS), TCAS SHOULD NOT BE SELECTED BEFORE RECEIVING CLEARANCE TO LINE UP, AND SHOULD BE DESELECTED AFTER VACATING THE RUNWAY.

SX0019/24 AIP SUPPLEMENT LFSB/BASLE/MULHOUSE VALIDITY: 03APR24 0300 - 15JUN24 0300 UTC -DESCRIPTION : THIS AIP SUP DESCRIBES THE PROGRESS OF WORK TO REPAIR PART OF TAXIWAY BRAVO, BETWEEN TAXIWAYS ECHO AND FOX. THE OPERATIONS WILL TAKE PLACE IN ONE WORK PHASE, ACTIVATED BY NOTAM. -GENERAL DISPOSITIONS : WORK CARRIED OUT AT NIGHT AND/OR DURING THE DAY. -AWO : FLIGHT PROCEDURES IN BAD WEATHER CONDITIONS (LVP) WILL NOT BE AFFECTED, BUT GROUND TAXIING WILL BE ADAPTED (STOP BARS OUT OF SERVICE). ACFT TAXIING WILL BE PARTIALLY REROUTED VIA TAXIWAY ALPHA AND THE MAIN RWY, DEPENDING ON THEIR WINGSPAN. ALL ARRIVING ACFT WILL BE PLACED BY A MARSHALL (FOLLOW-ME). - RESTRICTIONS / REGULATIONS : TRAFFIC REGULATIONS MEASURES WILL BE SET UP AND WAITING TIMES ARE TO BE EXPECTED ON ARRIVAL AND ON DEPARTURE. A35K, A388, CSM AND A346 ACFT WILL NOT BE ACCEPTED ON THE PLATFORM DURING THE CONSTRUCTION PERIOD (DUE TO GROUND TRAFFIC RESTRICTIONS). EXCEPT FOR MOVEMENTS ON THE MAIN RWY, FOUR-ENGINED ACFT WILL HAVE TO TAXI ON THE PLATFORM WITH THE OUTER ENGINES SHUT DOWN. SECONDARY RWY 07/25 WILL BE CLOSED WHEN QFU 33 IS IN USE. THE NORTH APRON WILL BE RESERVED FOR ACFT WITH WINGSPANS 44 M. CREWS OF ACFT WITH WINGSPANS 44 M MUST TAXI WITH CARE ON TAXIWAYS FOX AND GOLF AND MUST USE THE OVERSTEERING TECHNIQUE. CREWS OF ACFT WITH WINGSPANS BETWEEN 24 M AND 36 M MUST TAXI WITH CARE ON TAXIWAYS M1 AND M2 AND MUST USE THE OVERSTEERING TECHNIQUE. TAXIWAY ECHO WILL BE RESERVED FOR ACFT WITH WINGSPANS 36 M. TAXIWAY BRAVO BETWEEN 1 AND ECHO WILL BE RESERVED FOR ACFT WITH WINGSPANS 36 M. THE WORKSITE WILL BE SET UP DURING THE NIGHT BETWEEN APRIL 2 AND APRIL 3 2024.

AIRCRAFT WITH RADIO FAILURE MUST OPERATE AS FOLLOWS: DEPARTING AIRCRAFT CONTINUE STRICTLY ON THE ASSIGNED TAXI ROUTE TO THE CLEARENCE LIMIT AND WAIT FOR THE ARRIVAL OF THE FOLLOW-ME VHEICLE IN ORDER TO BE GUIDED TO THE PARKING STAND. ARRIVING AIRCRAFT - IF HAS ALREADY RECEIVED TAXIING INSTRUCTIONS, CONTINUES STRICTLY ON THE ASSIGNED TAXI ROUTE, TO THE CLEARENCE LIMIT AND WAIT FOR THE ARRIVAL OF THE FOLLOW-ME VHEICLE IN ORDER TO BE GUIDED TO THE PARKING STAND OR, IF HAS BEEN INSTRUCTED PROCEED TO THE PARKING STAND. - IF THE FAILURE OCCURS IN FLIGHT OR IN ANY CASE NO TAXIING INSTRUCTIONS HAVE BEEN RECEIVED: - IF IT RECEIVES SPECIFIC INSTRUCTIONS, VIA LIGHT SIGNALS, IT CLEARS THE LANDING AREA AND WAITS FOR THE FOLLOW-ME VHEICLE IN ORDER TO BE GUIDED TO THE PARKING STAND. - IF IT DOES NOT RECEIVE THESE INSTRUCTIONS VIA LIGHT SIGNALS (FOR EXAMPLE IN THE CASE OF REDUCED VISIBILITY) IT STOPS ON THE RUNWAY, AT THE FIRST AVAILABLE LINK, AND IN ANY CASE BASED ON ANY KNOWN RESTRICTIONS, WAITS FOR THE FOLLOW-ME VHEICLE IN ORDER TO BE GUIDED TO THE PARKING STAND. NOTE: THE INSTRUCTION TO CLEAR THE LANDING AREA, PROVIDED VIA LIGHT SIGNALS, DOES NOT IMPLY CONSTRAINTS ON THE ROUTE TO FOLLOW AND THEREFORE CAN ONLY BE USED WHEN COMPATIBLE WITH THE TRAFFIC SITUATION IN PROGRESS IN THE MANEUVERING AREA REF AIP AD 2 LIPK 1-13
ATS AND MET OBS ADDITIONALLY PROVIDED. REF AIP AD 2 LIPK 1-1 AND GEN 3.5-19

SX0060/22 AIP SUPPLEMENT EBBU/FIR - RESTRICTIONS RELATED TO THE RUSSIAN INVASION OF UKRAINE - 08SEP22-UFN 1 AVOIDANCE OF OPERATIONS IN THE CRISIS AREA BELGIAN AIR OPERATORS AND OWNERS OF AIRCRAFT REGISTERED IN BELGIUM SHALL NOT ENTER UKBU, UKLV, UKBV, UKDV, UKFV, UKOV, URRV. FLIGHT OPERATIONS SHALL ALSO BE AVOIDED WITHIN THE BUFFER ZONE EXTENDING OUT TO 200 NM ALONG THE UKRAINE/RUSSIA BORDER. OPERATIONS WITHIN LUUU SHALL ONLY BE UNDERTAKEN IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE APPLICABLE AERONAUTICAL PUBLICATIONS ISSUED BY THE REPUBLIC OF MOLDOVA. ADDITIONAL RISK ASSESSMENT AND FLIGHT PLANNING DECISIONS SHALL BE TAKEN BEFORE OPERATING UUWV. 2 RESTRICTIONS FOR RUSSIAN OPERATORS LL RUSSIAN REGISTERED AIRCRAFT AND AIRCRAFT OWNED, CHARTERED OR OPERATED, OR OTHERWISE CONTROLLED BY NATURAL OR LEGAL PERSONS FROM THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION OR BY OPERATORS HOLDING AN AIR OPERATOR CERTIFICATE (AOC) ISSUED BY THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION AUTHORITIES ARE PROHIBITED TO ENTER, EXIT OR OVERFLY BELGIAN AND LUXEMBOURGISH AIRSPACE, EXCEPT FOR HUMANITARIAN, SAR AND LEASED AIRCRAFT ONE-WAY RETURN FLIGHTS WITH THE PERMISSION OF THE APPROPRIATE BELGIAN OR LUXEMBOURGISH AUTHORITIES AND IN CASE OF EMERGENCY LANDING OR EMERGENCY OVERFLIGHT.
